item.title: Delta Tech Nepal
item.description: Delta Tech is a Nepal based web and mobile apps development company, and is led by professionals that have come back to Nepal from various destinations after building expertise in the field of IT. Every website and mobile app that we create is designed and built in-house by our team of experienced designers and developers. Our main areas of expertise include designing corporate websites, providing e-commerce solutions, developing web and mobile applications. Having done numerous work in the above areas, we focus on delivering high quality IT services to our clients.

item.title: STEAD fast IT
item.description: Computer support and services in Hartford, Connecticut. High-speed end user support for real time resolution with on-staff engineers. 24/7 systems monitoring. Website hosting, server hosting. Data backups, antivirus, server support. Software/hardware inventory. Help desk and unlimited remote support.

item.title: Shankar
item.description: Divya tech is a top IT business Company from Nepal that has developed accounting application, software (Accment). This application, aimed at large and small businesses alike, makes sure the management is relaxed about accounting of their business. In fact, the application can be regarded as yet another employee but with more efficiency and effectiveness. Moreover, it is diverse too, covering aspects ranging from bookkeeping to price book, from inventory management to payroll management. It covers issues that can range from the initial phase to the phase of preparing financial statements.

item.title: Social Aves (p) Ltd.
item.description: A digital marketing company which provide complete digital marketing services, a well-designed SEO friendly website, mobile application, which helps to grow the business and relationship between brands and customers. Social Aves tends to ask the question no one else ask to get the smartest ideas. We have a team of talented people who happen to love creating smart ideas for those who are willing to have us. We pride ourselves on delivering compelling, digital marketing solutions. Our winning solutions and experiences help many of our clients interact and engage with their customers in the best possible way. We work in areas as diverse as search engine optimisation, social media marketing, email marketing and digital marketing. We are Digital Media Marketing Service Provider In Nepal offers: Social Media Marketing Service Facebook Ads Google and Youtube Ads Local and International SEO Service Affiliation Management Service Online Business Promotion Service PPC (Pay Per Click) Service Email Marketing Service Mobile Marketing Digital Consultancy B2B & B2C Service
item.dc:creator: superadmin

item.title: Smart Technologies
item.description: Smart Technologies is a dynamic, multipurpose IT outsourcing company based in Damak,Jhapa, Nepal, which comes with over six years of experience in overall web design and web application development. With an impressive lineup of experienced professionals who are committed to client satisfaction, Smart Technologies is the ideal destination for businesses seeking quality software services at amazing prices.

item.title: Aum Technology
item.description: Established in 2067, Aum Technology is a diversified, competitive and professional service oriented organization to serve and facilitate prospective clients in the field of ICT in particular Network Design, Integration and Network Security. We are established to fulfill growing demands of ICT solutions in Nepal. Aum Technology advocates a new business design, which emphasizes a finely tuned integration of business, technology and people. Our mission is to become your one stop solution provider for Network, Security and Communication requirement. We provide prime IT Solutions and Services to your business so that you can focus on your core business; maximize your business output while reducing delivery time and hence adding value to the relationship. Service Offer:- ICT Consultant I Network Consultant | Network Products Sales| Security system| LAN ,WAN connectivity with Internet Services… Office Location:- Aum Technology, Rangeli Road, Biratnagar -9, Morang Contact: - 021-533087, 9801040313
